title: Welcome to the Aquarium!
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>How was it, Rina-chan? The aquarium here?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It was really fun. Rina-chan’s board 「Huff huff」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, that’s good to know<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Actually, when I went to the aquarium in Tokyo, I fell in love with the penguins because they were so cute. But, I might have grown to love dolphins too….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>The dolphin show was amazing huh! I also loved it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>No, I think the sea lions were…. Hnnn, I can’t choose. Everything was so cute<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Isn’t it fine to like all of them? Ah, that’s right, there are some plushies at the souvenir corner. Want to go look?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Rina-chan’s board 「Eyes wide open」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, you’re so easy to understand, Rina-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Rina-chan’s board 「Embarrassed」, Rina-chan’s board was possible because of Ai-san’s suggestions<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Is that so!? Ai-chan’s invention was perfect for Rina-chan huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>That’s right<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Then, should we go pick some souvenirs to give to Ai-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah. After that, I’m kind of hungry….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Leave it to me! There are a lot of delicious foods here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
